plot: An industrialist hates people from the south of Italy. When his daughter falls in love with one he is dead against it. Will he change his mind ?
title: Siamo tutti Milanesi
plot_es: An industrialist hates people from the south of Italy. When his daughter falls in love with one he is dead against it. Will he change his mind ?
plot_en: An industrialist hates people from the south of Italy. When his daughter falls in love with one he is dead against it. Will he change his mind ?
